verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> shir The song הַשִּׁירִ֖ים <S%H7892><s%> hash-shi-Rim of songs אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לִשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> lish-lo-Moh. which [is] Solomon's

יִשָּׁקֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H5401><s%> yish-sha-Ke-ni Let him kiss מִנְּשִׁיק֣וֹת <S%H5390><s%> min-ne-shi-Kot me with the kisses פִּ֔יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> Pi-hu, of his mouth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for טוֹבִ֥ים <S%H2896><s%> to-Vim [is] better דֹּדֶ֖יךָ <S%H1730><s%> do-Dei-cha for thy love מִיָּֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> mi-Ya-yin. than wine

לְרֵ֙יחַ֙ <S%H7381><s%> le-Rei-ach Because of the savour שְׁמָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H8081><s%> she-ma-Nei-cha ointments טוֹבִ֔ים <S%H2896><s%> to-Vim, of thy good שֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men [is as] ointment תּוּרַ֣ק <S%H7324><s%> tu-Rak poured forth שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha; thy name עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that עֲלָמ֥וֹת <S%H5959><s%> a-la-Mot therefore do the virgins אֲהֵבֽוּךָ׃ <S%H157><s%> 'a-he-Vu-cha. love

מָשְׁכֵ֖נִי <S%H4900><s%> ma-she-Che-ni Draw אַחֲרֶ֣יךָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-cha after נָּר֑וּצָה <S%H7323><s%> na-Ru-tzah; me we will run הֱבִיאַ֨נִי <S%H935><s%> he-vi-'A-ni hath brought הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech thee the king חֲדָרָ֗יו <S%H2315><s%> cha-da-Rav, me into his chambers נָגִ֤ילָה <S%H1523><s%> na-Gi-lah we will be glad וְנִשְׂמְחָה֙ <S%H8055><s%> ve-nis-me-Chah and rejoice בָּ֔ךְ Bach, נַזְכִּ֤ירָה <S%H2142><s%> naz-Ki-rah in thee we will remember דֹדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1730><s%> do-Dei-cha thy love מִיַּ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> mi-Ya-yin, more than wine מֵישָׁרִ֖ים <S%H4339><s%> mei-sha-Rim the upright אֲהֵבֽוּךָ׃ <S%H157><s%> 'a-he-Vu-cha. love ס sa-Mek

שְׁחוֹרָ֤ה <S%H7838><s%> she-cho-Rah I [am] black אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I וְֽנָאוָ֔ה <S%H5000><s%> ve-na-Vah, but comely בְּנ֖וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not O ye daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem כְּאָהֳלֵ֣י <S%H168><s%> ke-'o-ho-Lei as the tents קֵדָ֔ר <S%H6938><s%> ke-Dar, of Kedar כִּירִיע֖וֹת <S%H3407><s%> ki-ri-'ot as the curtains שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh. of Solomon

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּרְא֙וּנִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> tir-'U-ni Look שֶׁאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> she-'a-Ni I שְׁחַרְחֹ֔רֶת <S%H7840><s%> she-char-Cho-ret, not upon me because I [am] black שֶׁשֱּׁזָפַ֖תְנִי <S%H7805><s%> shesh-she-za-Fat-ni hath looked הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-Sha-mesh; because the sun בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei children אִמִּ֣י <S%H517><s%> 'im-Mi upon me my mother's נִֽחֲרוּ־ <S%H2787><s%> ni-cha-ru- were angry בִ֗י Vi, שָׂמֻ֙נִי֙ <S%H7760><s%> sa-Mu-ni with me they made נֹטֵרָ֣ה <S%H5201><s%> no-te-Rah me the keeper אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכְּרָמִ֔ים <S%H3754><s%> hak-ke-ra-Mim, of the vineyards כַּרְמִ֥י <S%H3754><s%> kar-Mi [but] mine own vineyard שֶׁלִּ֖י shel-Li לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo have not נָטָֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H5201><s%> na-Ta-re-ti. have I not kept

הַגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> hag-Gi-dah Tell לִּ֗י Li, שֶׁ֤אָהֲבָה֙ <S%H157><s%> she-'a-ha-vah loveth נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, me O thou whom my soul אֵיכָ֣ה <S%H349><s%> 'ei-Chah where תִרְעֶ֔ה <S%H7462><s%> tir-'Eh, where thou feedest אֵיכָ֖ה <S%H349><s%> 'ei-Chah how תַּרְבִּ֣יץ <S%H7257><s%> tar-Bitz thou makest [thy flock] to rest בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <S%H6672><s%> batz-tzo-ho-Ra-yim; at noon שַׁלָּמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> shal-la-Mah for אֶֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> 'eh-Yeh become כְּעֹ֣טְיָ֔ה <S%H5844><s%> ke-'O-te-Yah, why should I be as one that turneth aside עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al Beside עֶדְרֵ֥י <S%H5739><s%> 'ed-Rei by the flocks חֲבֵרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H2270><s%> cha-ve-Rei-cha. companion

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תֵדְעִי֙ <S%H3045><s%> te-de-'I If thou know לָ֔ךְ Lach, הַיָּפָ֖ה <S%H3303><s%> hai-ya-Fah not O thou fairest בַּנָּשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> ban-na-Shim; among women צְֽאִי־ <S%H3318><s%> tze-'i- go thy way forth לָ֞ךְ lach בְּעִקְבֵ֣י <S%H6119><s%> be-'ik-Vei by the footsteps הַצֹּ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon, of the flock וּרְעִי֙ <S%H7462><s%> u-re-'I and feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּדִיֹּתַ֔יִךְ <S%H1429><s%> ge-di-yo-Ta-yich, thy kids עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al By מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת <S%H4908><s%> mish-ke-Not tents הָרֹעִֽים׃ <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im. beside the shepherds' ס sa-Mek

לְסֻסָתִי֙ <S%H5484><s%> le-su-sa-Ti to a company of horses בְּרִכְבֵ֣י <S%H7393><s%> be-rich-Vei chariots פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh, in Pharaoh's דִּמִּיתִ֖יךְ <S%H1819><s%> dim-mi-Tich I have compared רַעְיָתִֽי׃ <S%H7474><s%> ra'-ya-Ti. thee O my love

נָאו֤וּ <S%H4998><s%> na-Vu are comely לְחָיַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H3895><s%> le-cha-Ya-yich Thy cheeks בַּתֹּרִ֔ים <S%H8447><s%> bat-to-Rim, with rows צַוָּארֵ֖ךְ <S%H6677><s%> tzav-va-Rech [of jewels] thy neck בַּחֲרוּזִֽים׃ <S%H2737><s%> ba-cha-ru-Zim. with chains

תּוֹרֵ֤י <S%H8447><s%> to-Rei thee borders זָהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav of gold נַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-seh- We will make לָּ֔ךְ Lach, עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im With נְקֻדּ֥וֹת <S%H5351><s%> ne-kud-Dot with studs הַכָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ka-sef. of silver

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- While שֶׁ֤הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> she-ham-Me-lech While the king בִּמְסִבּ֔וֹ <S%H4524><s%> bim-sib-Bo, [sitteth] at his table נִרְדִּ֖י <S%H5373><s%> nir-Di my spikenard נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan sendeth forth רֵיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H7381><s%> rei-Cho. the smell

צְר֨וֹר <S%H6872><s%> tze-Ror A bundle הַמֹּ֤ר׀ <S%H4753><s%> ham-Mor of myrrh דּוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> do-Di [is] my wellbeloved לִ֔י Li, בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein between שָׁדַ֖י <S%H7699><s%> sha-Dai all night betwixt my breasts יָלִֽין׃ <S%H3885><s%> ya-Lin. unto me he shall lie

אֶשְׁכֹּ֨ל <S%H811><s%> 'esh-Kol [is] unto me [as] a cluster הַכֹּ֤פֶר׀ <S%H3724><s%> hak-Ko-fer of camphire דּוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> do-Di My beloved לִ֔י Li, בְּכַרְמֵ֖י <S%H3754><s%> be-char-Mei in the vineyards עֵ֥ין 'ein גֶּֽדִי׃ <S%H5872><s%> Ge-di. of Engedi ס sa-Mek

הִנָּ֤ךְ <S%H2005><s%> hin-Nach behold יָפָה֙ <S%H3303><s%> ya-Fah Behold thou [art] fair רַעְיָתִ֔י <S%H7474><s%> ra'-ya-Ti, my love הִנָּ֥ךְ <S%H2005><s%> hin-Nach behold יָפָ֖ה <S%H3303><s%> ya-Fah behold thou [art] fair עֵינַ֥יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Na-yich eyes יוֹנִֽים׃ <S%H3123><s%> yo-Nim. thou [hast] doves'

הִנְּךָ֨ <S%H2005><s%> hin-ne-Cha behold יָפֶ֤ה <S%H3303><s%> ya-Peh Behold thou [art] fair דוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> do-Di my beloved אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> 'af so נָעִ֔ים <S%H5273><s%> na-'Im, yea pleasant אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- Indeed עַרְשֵׂ֖נוּ <S%H6210><s%> 'ar-Se-nu also our bed רַעֲנָנָֽה׃ <S%H7488><s%> ra-'a-na-Nah. [is] green

קֹר֤וֹת <S%H6982><s%> ko-Rot The beams בָּתֵּ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1004><s%> bat-Tei-nu of our house אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> 'a-ra-Zim, [are] cedar; רַחִיטֵנוּ ra-chi-te-nu כרַהִיטֵ֖נוּ <S%H7351><s%> ra-hi-Te-nu rafter קבְּרוֹתִֽים׃ <S%H1266><s%> be-ro-Tim. of fir
